channel.title: Bow of light
channel.description:
I've decided to make a set of weapons and maybe evan armor like this. Based off star wars type technology. It starts with just the handle you press the button and the bow comes to life. The arrows automaticaly fire when you release the bow.
Hate/Rate/Ejaculate.
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/28vvwvm.png[/img]

item.title: Bow of light
item.dc:creator: @claunchii claunchii
item.description:
@claunchii wrote:

Eh… took about 10 minutes. mainly cause i couldnt think of a color. Gonig to redo the model…

item.title: Bow of light
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Don’t like the concept. Because I don’t like star wars. Just my opinion.
[size=1pt]Whippersnapper was a joke for calling me a young man.[/size]

item.title: Bow of light
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“the wanderer, post:6, topic:363339”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=459594.msg3363459#msg3363459 date=1286590968]

Hate star wars and anything to do with it.

Uh, that’s your opinion and has nothing to do with the model. Back on topic young man.
[/quote]
Was completely on-topic. He said it uses star wars technology and I said I hate star wars. That is my opinion, but when people rate models isn’t that also their opinion? Go back to watching star wars ye ole whippersnapper.[/quote]
whippersnapper? perhaps you should go smoke some more pot, because 2 negatives make a positive.
In any case, it’s about the model, not your opinion on star wars. You didn’t judge his model at all, just commented on how you dislike starwars. I don’t feel like starting a flame war, but seriously, just stating my point on opinions, and when I state my facts on opinions, I’m right in the eyes of most.

Read full topic
